div.bibl: Svenska Nyheter, Sept. 22, 1903. [BENEFIT PERFORMANCE FOR LEGAL ASSISTANCE]

body.p: A program of music and drama for the purpose of collecting the necessary funds to defray the expenses connected with the trial of John Nordgren, will be given on Saturday, September 26, at Spelz Hall, 1630 North Clark Street.

The musical portion of the program will consist of seven numbers, and will be followed by the presentation of a play by Utters entitled "Ett Friorafventyr" (The Tale of a Proposal), a comedy in two acts. After the performance there will be dancing.
